ygData.subject: Bull Smasher
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it looks like I have found a great way to get the bull smasher every time I complete the quest. spolier space follows / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
ygData.messageBody:
Well it looks like I have found a great way to get the bull smasher every time
I complete the quest.
spolier space follows

Okay this was really a no brainer but I don't know if everyone will want to
take the time but... I created a Gnome Warrior of Rodcet Nife (sp). I then got
him up to 6th lvl, (I did this in one day on a saturday). Now every time I
turn in the completed Box I have gotten the Bull Smasher, 4 times in a row
now. I have gotten one for me and my friends with one to sell so have at it.

Bullsmasher: Damage 6, Delay 20, +2 str, +2 dex, +2 agil. Classes: C, P,
Ra, SK, Sm, Wr. Races: Gnm, Drf, Hlf.

And as always the best site for info. http://everquest.gamestats.com/
